Title: Hey Redditors, They Saved You Some Stock in Reddit’s IPO

Title: ADHD medication shortage leads to job fears
Description: A charity for people with ADHD says many employers have lost patience with staff with the condition.
Content:
A charity for people with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) says it fears many have lost their jobs as they cannot get their medication.

Title: A photo editor says it's 'astonishing' Kensington Palace released the recent image of Kate Middleton
Description: "It's astonishing that Kensington Palace released it, and even more bewildering that the wires distributed it," said Patrick Witty.
Content:
Multiple photo agencies have retracted a picture of Kate Middleton and her children due to concerns that the image could have been digitally manipulated.
